wikitext.*:
{{font|[http://www.acondia.com/fonts/cirth/ Cirth Erebor] and [https://at.boktypografen.se/parmaite.htm Tengwar Parmaite]}} {{disambig-more|The One Ring|[[The One Ring (disambiguation)]]}} {{Board game infobox | name=The One Ring | image=The One Ring (role-playing game).jpg | caption= | type=rpg | designer=Francesco Nepitello, Marco Maggi | publisher=[[Cubicle 7 Entertainment|Cubicle 7]] (First Edition)
[[Free League Publishing|Free League]] (Second Edition) | releasedate=[[2011]] | players= | ages= }} '''''The One Ring''''' is a role-playing game published by [[Cubicle 7 Entertainment]] (under license from [[Sophisticated Games]]), released in August [[2011]]. The game is written by Francesco Nepitello, and features artwork by [[John Howe]] and other artists.[http://www.icv2.com/articles/news/19873.html 'The One Ring' RPG] at [http://www.icv2.com/index.php ICv2.com] (accessed 20 April 2011)[http://www.cubicle7.co.uk/ Cubicle7.co.uk] (accessed 11 August 2011) In November [[2019]], the publisher decided to end the licensing agreement with Sophisticated Games, due to contractual differences.[https://www.cubicle7games.com/unexpected-tor2-update Unexpected The One Ring 2 Update] In [[2021]], a new edition has been announced on Kickstarter, for crowdfunding, under the publisher [[Free League Publishing|Free League]] and began to be shipped to supporters in October of the same year.[https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1192053011/the-one-ring-roleplaying-game-second-edition/ Kickstarter Page of 'The One Ring'] Having fulfilled all deliveries to the backers, Free League has officially released the RPG for wider retail purchase, on the 22nd of March [[2022]].[https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1192053011/the-one-ring-roleplaying-game-second-edition/posts/3460049 Kickstarter Update: Retail Release][https://us3.campaign-archive.com/?u=2dcfb24fb7c8d0fb9c2f52040&id=2354eca464 "The One Ringâ„¢ RPG Out Now!"] ==Setting== The initial release (originally planned to be first of a trilogy), ''The One Ring: Adventures over the Edge of the Wild'', is based in the area of northern [[Mirkwood]], after the events of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' and before the [[War of the Ring]].[http://www.cubicle7.co.uk/our-games/the-one-ring/the-one-ring-characters/ The One Ring: Characters] at [http://www.cubicle7.co.uk/ Cubicle7.co.uk] (accessed 20 June 2011) The Second Edition of The One Ring is now set in the lone-lands of [[Eriador]], in the year 2965 of the Third Age, moving the focus of the game to the lands of Old [[Arnor]], with a full description of the town of [[Bree]], including also famous locales like [[Weathertop]], [[Fornost]] and [[Annuminas]], providing the players with a new starting point for their adventures. ==Game system== ''The One Ring'' uses custom dice, specifically a twelve sided die numbered 1-10, the "Eye of Sauron", and the "Gandalf" Rune (a [[Cirth]] G rune, r), and 6 sided dice numbered normally, but with the 1-3 being in outline, 4-5 solid, and 6 solid having also the [[Tengwar]] [[Lambe]] rune, {{tg|mode=smith|j}}. Standard 12-sided dice can be used, counting 11 as Sauron, and 12 as Gandalf, and standard 6 sided dice as well.The One Ring RPG, Adventurer Book, pages 24-25 ==Publications== First edition published by [[Cubicle 7 Entertainment]] *[[2011]]: ''[[The One Ring: Adventures over the Edge of the Wild|'''The One Ring: Adventures over the Edge of the Wild''']]'' **''Loremaster's Book'' (for GMs) **''Adventurer's Book'' (for players) *[[2012]]: ''[[Words of the Wise]]'' *[[2012]]: ''[[Tales from Wilderland]]'' *[[2012]]: ''The One Ring Dice Set'' *[[2012]]: ''[[Loremaster's Screen and Lake-town Sourcebook]]'' *[[2013]]: ''[[The Heart of the Wild]]'' *[[2013]]: ''[[Hobbit Tales from the Green Dragon Inn]]'' *2014: '''''The One Ring Roleplaying Game''''', a revised edition of the core rules in a single 320-page hardback volume *[[2014]]: ''[[The Darkening of Mirkwood]]'' *[[2014]]: ''[[Rivendell (The One Ring role-playing game)|Rivendell]]'' *[[2015]]: ''[[Ruins of the North]]'' *[[2016]]: ''[[Journeys and Maps]]'' *[[2016]]: ''[[Erebor (The One Ring role-playing game)|Erebor - The Lonely Mountain]]'' *[[2017]]: ''[[Bree]]'' *[[2017]]: ''[[Adventurer's Companion]]'' Second Edition published by [[Free League Publishing]] *[[2021]]: '''''The One Ring, Second Edition''''' **''Core Rules'' **''Starter Set'' **''Loremaster's Screen & Rivendell Compendium'' (for GMs) **''The One Ring Black Dice Set'' **''The One Ring White Dice Set'' *[[2022]]: ''Ruins of the Lost Realm'' *[[2022]]: ''Strider Mode'' *[[2022]]: ''Peoples of Wilderland'' *[[2022]]: ''Character Lifepaths'' *[[2023]]: ''Tales From the Lone-lands'' *[[2024]]: ''Moria Through The Doors of Durin'' *[[2025]]: ''Realms of the Three Rings'' *[[2025]]: ''Hands of the White Wizard'' *[[2025]]: ''Hobbit Tales'' ==External links== *[http://www.cubicle7.co.uk/our-games/the-one-ring/ The One Ring 1st Edition] (official page) *[https://freeleaguepublishing.com/en/games/the-one-ring/ The One Ring 2nd Edition] (official page) {{references}} {{rpg}} {{title}} [[Category:Role playing games]]
